name: Mini Fenty Eau de Parfum Perfume Duo
categories: Fragrance, Value & Gift Sets, Perfume Gift Sets
about: Fragrance Family:Florals.Scent Type:Warm Florals.Key Notes:Magnolia, Musk, Bulgarian Rose.Set Description:Comforting vegan musk collides with luxurious Bulgarian rose absolute while patchouli and juicy tangerine create a tension between spicy and sweet. And then there’s the star, the note that changed it all for Rihanna: magnolia. Its creamy sweetness with a zesty twist equals instant compliments..About the Bottle:The experience begins as soon as you lay your eyes on the glowing, amber-brown bottle. A deeply personal color to Rihanna, and a rich representation of feminine and masculine energy..About the Fragrance:Like its creator, Fenty Eau De Parfum turns the invisible into the unmissable, attracting all the attention. Created by Rihanna in partnership with top perfumer Jacques Cavallier-Belletrud in the heart of Grasse, France, it’s a bold, complex statement that says look at me…and stay thinking of me..This Set Contains:- 0.2 oz/ 6 mL Fenty Eau de Parfum Miniature
ingredients: Alcohol, Parfum, Fragrance, Aqua, Water, Eau, Limonene, Citronellol, Linalool, Geraniol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Cinnamyl Alcohol, Citral, Benzyl Alcohol, Eugenol, Ci 60730 (Ext. Violet 2).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fenty Eau de Parfum skips the small talk and gets straight to the heart, right from the start, revealing its warmth and extending its wear for an impression that lasts..The superfine mist radiates beautifully when applied to the center chest.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this perfume!!! I get so much compliments on it! It smells clean but sexy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: HORRIBLE HORRIBLE HORRIBLE... I do not recommend this at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Not for me. Really wanted to like it but just my scent.
It smells cheap! Exremely horrible perfume. Not worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is really great smelling. It is potent, so if you are sensitive to smells, I would say be careful but other than that it's great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Ebony skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have purchased this perfume twice and I love it I get so many compliments and I will buy it again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I tell you, I got so many compliments. It was crazy. I also paired with body cream for it. The combination was chef kiss. Definitely recommend. Rihanna did her thang

It's a musky rose and I love it. It lasts a long time on the skin. You basically get the mini bottle for $3 more with the travel spray. It smells similar to the Nest Rose Noir & Oud Candle which I also love.
